Store the following reagents at 2-10 Â°C.
DO NOT FREEZE.
Lumipulse G Total Tau Immunoreaction Cartridges
Lumipulse G Total Tau Calibrators set
Lumipulse Total Tau Controls
Lumipulse G Substrate Solution
Lumipulse G Wash Solution When stored and handled properly, reagents remain stable until the expiration date. Refer to the expiration date shown on the immediate container labels.
